subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: In only its eighth season of play in the N.C.A.A.’s top division, the University of Connecticut football team is three wins away from an automatic berth in the Bowl Championship Series.
snippet: In only its eighth season of play in the N.C.A.A.’s top division, the University of Connecticut football team is three wins away from an automatic berth in the Bowl Championship Series.
